term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - cyclic acid anhydrides (cyclic anhydrides)
term.title: cyclic acid anhydrides

item.text: Acid anhydrides derived by loss of water between two oxoacid functions RkE(=O)l(OH)m (l ≠ 0) (carboxylic, sulfonic, etc.) in the same molecule so as to close a ring. Oxo oxygen replacement analogues are included, e.g. [image: Not defined]
